posts.post_content:
Looking for a lower condition example, any player. Love the back and want to add one to my collection. Please PM if you have anything available. thanks for looking.

Steve

Still looking for a 1909 Obak to break the ice on this set. Currently collecting the T206 monster with my 9 year old daughter and she fell in love when she saw the pastel colors on the Obaks. Have a budget of around $60.00. If anyone has one available, it would really be appreciated. I'd also consider 1910 & 1911, but I do love the 1909 back style. 

Thanks and Happy New Year! 

Steve

Hi Steve, 

I have this T212 available for $60

[url]http://s1122.beta.photobucket.com/user/sean11251/media/Vintage%20FT/IMG_0020.jpg.html?sort=3&o=18[/url]

Thanks for the offer Sean.

I'm still hoping to find a 1909 T212. Take it easy, Steve

Bump. Just looking for a lower grade 1909 T212 Obak common. Please help me out folks!!

Thanks,

Steve
[URL="http://www.baseballcardresource.com/forsale/T212-1/index.html"]Here are a bunch[/URL] that I have.  I will look around as I think I have a raw one or two that might be more in your price range.

Thanks, much appreciated. Great selection of graded cards!! Please let me know if you happen to find a raw example. 

Take care,

Steve
